data.headline: Innovative Product Manager with a Passion for Startup Success
data.summary: Accomplished Product Manager with a proven track record of driving innovation and delivering exceptional results in fast-paced startup environments. Adept at aligning cross-functional teams, leveraging data-driven insights, and creating user-centric products that delight customers. Passionate about the intersection of technology, design, and business strategy. Thrives in dynamic, collaborative settings and is committed to continuous learning and improvement.

experience.title: Product Manager
experience.paragraph: Spearheaded the development and launch of a groundbreaking SaaS platform that revolutionized the way small businesses manage their operations. Leveraged user insights, market analysis, and cross-functional collaboration to define the product roadmap and deliver innovative features that drove rapid user adoption and revenue growth. Championed a data-driven, iterative approach to product development, continuously optimizing the user experience and aligning the product with evolving customer needs.

experience.title: Associate Product Manager
experience.paragraph: Played a pivotal role in the launch of a cutting-edge mobile app that disrupted the fitness industry. Collaborated closely with engineering, design, and marketing teams to translate user insights into a seamless, intuitive user experience. Spearheaded the implementation of data-driven product decisions, leveraging analytics to identify and address pain points, and drive continuous improvement. Gained valuable experience in the full product lifecycle, from ideation to launch and beyond.

experience.title: Product Management Intern
experience.paragraph: Contributed to the development and launch of several early-stage startup products, gaining hands-on experience in user research, prototyping, and iterative product development. Collaborated with founders and cross-functional teams to refine product strategies, identify growth opportunities, and optimize the user experience. Developed a deep understanding of the startup ecosystem and the unique challenges and opportunities faced by innovative, fast-paced organizations.

projects.name: Fintech Startup Accelerator
projects.description: Participated in a highly selective startup accelerator program, working closely with founders to develop and launch a new fintech product. Contributed to market research, user testing, and the implementation of agile development practices.

projects.name: University Hackathon
projects.description: Led a cross-disciplinary team to develop a mobile app that addressed a pressing social issue. Leveraged design thinking principles and rapid prototyping to create a solution that won the grand prize.

interests: Exploring the latest trends in technology and innovation
Mentoring aspiring entrepreneurs and product managers
data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Étienne Mercier, a mid-career product manager with a creative, startup-focused persona, wearing a collared shirt and looking directly at the camera with a friendly, confident expression.
